title: js2
content: if((plyrInput == 'Paper') && (cmptrInput == 'Rock')){playrRecd.push('Win'); rst = 'Win';}else if((plyrInput == 'Rock') && (cmptrInput == 'Paper ')){playrRecd.push('Lose'); rst = 'Lose';}else if((plyrInput == 'Rock') && (cmptrInput == 'Scissors ')){playrRecd.push('Win');rst = 'Win';}else if((plyrInput == 'Scissors') && (cmptrInput == 'Rock')){playrRecd.push('Lose');rst = 'Lose';}else if((plyrInput == 'Scissors') && (cmptrInput == 'Paper')){playrRecd.push('Win');rst = 'Win'; }else if((plyrInput == 'Paper') && (cmptrInput == 'Scissors')){ playrRecd.push('Lose'); rst = 'Lose';}else if(plyrInput == cmptrInput){playrRecd.push('Tie');rst = 'Tie';} document.getElementById("rst").innerHTML = rst; document.getElementById("totPlyrPld").innerHTML = totPlyrPld; document.getElementById("totPpr").innerHTML = totPpr; document.getElementById("totScsr").innerHTML = totScsr; document.getElementById("totRock").innerHTML = totRock;var relts = playrRecd.toString();document.getElementById("relts").innerHTML = relts;  }function validateForm(){var radios = document.getElementsByName("selection");var formValid = false;var i = 0;while (!formValid && i < radios.length) {if (radios[i].checked) formValid = radios[i].value;     i++;   }if (!formValid) alert("Must select some option!");   return formValid;   }   <script type = "text/javscript"> var input = window.prompt("enter name"); document.write("hello" + input); var enteredNum; var allNumbers = ""; for(var i = 0; i < 3; i++) {enteredNum = window.prompt("please enter a number"); allNumbers += enteredNum + " "; } var count = 0; while(count < 3) {enteredNum = window.prompt("please enter a number"); allNumbers += enteredNum + " "; count++; } document.write(allNumbers); </script>
